title.rendered: The Vine Rant: Real Estate Predictions in a COVID-19 World – What Buyers and Sellers should know

content.rendered: Join us, as Usman Mahmood of The Usman Group – Sotheby’s International Real Estate, walks us through the COVID-19 experience from a real estate point of view. How has the pandemic impacted the market and what can be predicted for the future?

excerpt.rendered: Join us, as Usman Mahmood of The Usman Group – Sotheby’s International Real Estate, walks us through the COVID-19 experience from a real estate point of view. How has the pandemic impacted the market and what can be predicted for the future?
